note.text: As your counterpart becomes comfortable with you, they might express curiosity in political views or religious practices. Avoid bringing up these sensitive issues, but handle discussions on a case-by-case basis. Having an open-minded, respectful exchange about your views shows you trust your counterpart, and are willing to discuss important differences in your perspectives.
If you feel a topic is inappropriate, or you're uncomfortable attempting to navigate the subject, be honest and say you'd rather not discuss it, or find a way to gracefully change the subject.
